revised_prompt: Generate a professional banner advertisement with the dimensions of 728x90 pixels. The design should adhere to a clean, modern and professional style with a simple and uncluttered layout. The typography should include sans-serif fonts, providing a high contrast for better legibility. The brand name, 'Nike', should be the largest element which is bold and placed at the top or center. The main message '50% off' should be of medium size and centered. An eye-catching 'Shop Now' button should be prominently placed at the bottom. The color scheme should be vibrant and professional, with a clean or subtle background that would not affect the text readability. The high contrast between the text and background, along with no decorative text or complex patterns, ensures the text would be crystal clear and easy to read. The overall quality of the banner should look like professional advertising.
